roleset.name: hanging out on a bench, in a sitting position
roleset.note: BENCHSITTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.

example.name: benchsitting-n
example.text: Sitting balance is slightly impaired with slight sway in benchsitting noted toward end of session .

roleset.name: on the team but not playing, in sports
roleset.note: BENCHSITTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.

example.name: benchsitting-n
example.text: Doesnt need to quit his benchsitting position on the hs team, tho' he does need to factor in the liklihood of the coach booting him.
